question: Which organisation recently deployed its all-women team for contingency duties?
explanation:
An all-female team of National Disaster Response Force (NDRF) was recently deployed for contingency duties in Uttar Pradeshâ€™s Garh Mukteshwar town, on the banks of the Ganga river.
The team who are professionally trained handled the rescue boats and related equipment. The first batch of over a hundred women disaster combatants and rescuers was also inducted in the NDRF.
